body: Find out more about the content of the Builders module of the Kentico MVC for Developers course
pageBody: Find out more about the content of the Builders module of the Kentico MVC for Developers course
displayTitle: Introduction to Kentico MVC for Developers—Builders

body: Meet page builder and form builder. The Kentico 12 features that put great freedom in the hands of content editors, without compromising the clean architecture of ASP.NET MVC.
pageBody: Meet page builder and form builder. The Kentico 12 features that put great freedom in the hands of content editors, without compromising the clean architecture of ASP.NET MVC.
displayTitle: Introduction to page builder and form builder

body: Get bootstrapped into page builder. Find out what it's good for, what its inner parts are and how the interact with each other.
pageBody: Get bootstrapped into page builder. Find out what it's good for, what its inner parts are and how the interact with each other.
title: Page builder overview

body: Learn the development fundamentals of form builder. Find out how the inner parts work together.
pageBody: Learn the development fundamentals of form builder. Find out how the inner parts work together.
title: Form builder overview

body: Start developing your first builder-enabled page. Create the underlying infrastructure.
pageBody: Start developing your first builder-enabled page. Create the underlying infrastructure.
title: Creating a builder-enabled page, part 1

body: Continue in creating your first builder-enabled page. Prepare your page sections and a simple text widget.
pageBody: Continue in creating your first builder-enabled page. Prepare your page sections and a simple text widget.
title: Creating a builder-enabled page, part 2

body: Take another step towards mastering the development of widgets. Build a widget that can display a media library image of choice.
pageBody: Take another step towards mastering the development of widgets. Build a widget that can display a media library image of choice.
title: Creating a static image widget

body: Let your knowledge shine in the last widget of this course—the slideshow widget.
pageBody: Let your knowledge shine in the last widget of this course—the slideshow widget.
title: Creating an image slideshow widget

body: Learn about the advanced features that make managing content with the page builder even easier.
pageBody: Learn about the advanced features that make managing content with the page builder even easier.

body: Refresh and broaden your theoretical knowledge from the initial pages of this course. Dive deeper into the internals of the form builder.
pageBody: Refresh and broaden your theoretical knowledge from the initial pages of this course. Dive deeper into the internals of the form builder.

body: Put the theory learned in the previous page into practice by creating form components and a validation rule for the Medio Clinic website.
pageBody: Put the theory learned in the previous page into practice by creating form components and a validation rule for the Medio Clinic website.
displayTitle: Creating a form component, validation rule

body: Discover the secrets of creating page templates in Kentico MVC projects. They provide standardized layouts, common functionality for your most frequent scenarios, and the ability to save an existing page as a template.
pageBody: Discover the secrets of creating page templates in Kentico MVC projects. They provide standardized layouts, common functionality for your most frequent scenarios, and the ability to save an existing page as a template.
title: Creating an MVC page template

body: Get guidance to render basic Kentico forms in case using page builder is undesired in the project.
pageBody: Get guidance to render basic Kentico forms in case using page builder is undesired in the project.

body: Before you finish the course, get a quick refresher on performance optimization.
pageBody: Before you finish the course, get a quick refresher on performance optimization.
